name: Kunju!!!! MY lovely kitty
greetingText: Im so in love with you honeyy bunnn
wishText: May the js.prototypes always be with you! ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
wishHeading: Happy Birthday!!!!I reallyyyyy love u honeyyyy my lovely baby Im obsessed with u I would never leave u no matter how hard u try  I'm your one and only leech
outroText: I hope that you,my dear orange kitty with a pink nose, would have a wonderful Birthday
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
